channel.title: Skill Cape Animations
channel.description:
Attached pic of an attempt. I can only implement the graphics atm, but not the animations portion.
I need to implement the animation from "seq.dat".
You see that there is the woodcutting skill cape emote in the right hand corner.

item.title: Skill Cape Animations
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote=“Liam-, post:4, topic:146253”]Just re-read your post, i thought you we’re asking how to add emotes and gfx to your emotes server-side, not client-side, please state more information when posting, as to not confuse people.

it would be good if you didn’t act so big and bad, to those who try to help you, by the way.

-Liam[/quote]
It’s not a question. I was showing people that you could do it.

Look in the right hand corner of the pic, thats the skill cape emote for woodcutting.
